article_title: Richmond Times-Dispatch: Richmond Area Business News
article_text:
Related Stories Related: How list of employer rankings was compiled

A. The VCU Health System’s number does not include the 7,107 full-time equivalent employees at VCU’s academic campus. Those results are included in the state figures.

B. Amazon could not provide a specific number but said it had more than 3,300 full-time employees.

C. DuPont restated its 2014 figure upward. DuPont had not reflected non-operations employees who are based at its Spruance Plant.

D. Anthem’s parent company changed its name from WellPoint.

E. UPS revised its 2014 figure downward.

F. The Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond restated its figure upward. Inc. 27 1,356 265,000 Details 23 Genworth Financial Inc. 22 1,332 5,100 Details 24 CarMax Inc. 25 1,243 22,000 Details 25 Southside Regional Medical 21 1,200 Parent company (CHS) 135,000 Details 26 Honeywell International Inc. 24 1,200 127,000 Details 27 Estes Express Lines 28 1,075 More than 16,000 Details 28 Supervalu Inc 30 984 38,500 Details 29 BB&T 29 893 34,000 Details 30 Tyson Food Inc. 32 850 124,000 Details 31 Macy's Inc. 33 840 170,000 Details 32 T-Mobile USA Inc. 35 830 40,000 Details 33 Patient First 34 767 2,108 FTEs Details 34 MeadWestvaco Corp 31 730 About 15,600 Details 35 Northrop Grumman 37 717 About 65,000 Details 36 Union Bankshares Corp. 50 663 1,445 Details 37 McKesson Medical-Surgical Inc. 47 660 85,000 Details 38 Walgreens 39 659 315,000 drugstores worldwide; 251,000 in the U.S. Details 39 Comcast 40 654 139,000 Details 40 Allianz Global Assistance 41 651 13,000 Details 41 Owens & Minor Inc. 48 644 7,800 Details 42 Southern States 42 644 3,640 Details 43 YMCA of Greater Richmond 38 633 633 FTE Details 44 ODS Security Solutions 43 623 1,000 Details 45 McGuireWoods LLP 45 615 1,933 Details 46 Westminster Canterbury 49 600 N/A Details 47 Hunton & Williams LLP 44 591 1,538 Details 48 BH Media Group NR 569 N/A Details 49 Health Diagnostic Laboratory Inc. 36 560 640 FTE Details 50 Goodwill of Central and Coastal Virginia 46 551 1,288 Details

The area’s largest private employers had 108,367 full-time equivalent employees as of Jan. 1, 2016, an increase of 1,730, or 1.62 percent, compared with 2015's revised figures. Twenty-five companies reported gains this year, 22 had decreases and three remained the same as in 2015. General Electric, Performance Food Group, Mondelez International and Virginia Credit Union are new to the list this year. Click here to load this Caspio Cloud Database Cloud Database by Caspio A.The VCU Health System’s number does not include the 5,978 full-time equivalent employees at VCU’s academic campus. Those results are included in state figures.

B. Amazon could not provide a specific FTE number but said it had more than 3,800 employees.

C. DuPont revised its 2015 FTE figure downward.

D. Bank of America adjusted its 2015 FTE figure downward because it had included contractors in its previous figures.

E. General Electric is new to the list this year after GE bought Alstom Power.

F. WestRock is the new name of the combined companies of MeadWestvaco and RockTenn.
